entry.title: Tell Don't Ask vs. State Machines
entry.content:
Tell Don't Ask vs. State Machines

Sandi Metz' RailsConf 2015 "Nothing is Something"

About two nights after I came back from RailsConf 2015 in Atlanta, I got up at least 8 times and scribbled out around 10 pages of notes on removing conditionals from Rails codebases (read: my company's codebases). This sleeplessness and these notes were a side-effect of exposure to Sandi Metz's fantastic talk Nothing is Something. And I'd like the missed sleep back.
